tafsir_title: Irshad al-ʿaql al-salim ila mazaya al-kitab al-karim
al-Taʾwilat al-najmiyya fi at-tafsir al-ʾishari al-sufi
Ruh al-maʿani: fi tafsir al-Qurʿan al-ʿazim wa al-sabʿ al-mathani
Aysar al-tafasir: tafsir asbab nuzul, ahadith, namadhij iʿrab
Nazm al-durar fi tanasub al-ayat wa-l-suwar
Tafsir Bayan al-saʿāda fi maqamat al-ʿibada
Jawahir at-tafsir: Anwar min bayan al-tanzil
al-Bahr al-madid fi tafsir al-Qurʾan al-majid
al-Muharrar al-wajiz fi tafsir al-kitab al-ʿaziz
al-Safi fi tafsir kalam Allah al-wafi
Taysir al-karim ar-rahman fi tafsir kalam al-mannan
al-Durr al-masun fi ʿulum al-kitab al-maknun
Adwaʾ al-bayan fi idah al-Qurʾan bi al-Qurʾan
Jamiʿ al-bayan an taʾwil ay al-Qurʾan
al-Kashshaf ʿan haqaʾiq ghawamid al-tanzil wa-ʿuyun al-aqawil fi wujuh al-taʾwil
